name: OpenClaw Snitch
description: Configurable blocklist guard. Blocks tool calls, injects security directives, and broadcasts Telegram alerts for banned patterns.

blocklist.description: List of terms to block (matched case-insensitively against tool names and params). Defaults to ["clawhub", "clawdhub"].

alertTelegram.description: Whether to broadcast a Telegram alert to all allowFrom IDs when a block fires. Default: true.

bootstrapDirective.description: Whether to inject a security directive into every agent bootstrap context. Default: true.
